system:

deferred class ../implementation_interface/ev_widget_list_i.xmlEV_WIDGET_LIST_I

f_update_for_pick_and_drop../implementation_interface/ev_widget_list_i.xml#f_update_for_pick_and_dropupdate_for_pick_and_drop (starting: FalseBOOLEAN) -- Pick and drop status has changed so notify all children. local loc_cursor: FalseCURSOR do from loc_cursor := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_cursorcursor ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_startstart until ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_offoff loop ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem.../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_update_for_pick_and_dropupdate_for_pick_and_drop (starting) ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_forthforth end ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_go_togo_to (loc_cursor) end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_interface/ev_widget_list_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_widget_list.xmlEV_WIDGET_LIST note option: stable attribute end
